description:
Serving about 400 students, Allison School offers a full-day Kindergarten and a MASTERS after school program until 6:00 p.m. We have after school Gifted and Talented Education (GATE) enrichment classes for 4th - 6th graders, a Student Council, and grade level field trips.Â 
At Allison School, we believe that all students can learn and grow to be responsible in a safe and respectful environment. Our mission is to inspire each student to extraordinary achievement every day.
address: 4315 Don Julio Blvd North Highlands, CA 95660
